alert.note: Alert for Dent; Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 5:02PM CDT until March 31 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SHANNON AND EASTERN DENT COUNTIES... At 501 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 14 miles northeast of Raymondville, or 15 miles south of Salem, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Montauk State Park, Bunker, Montauk, Turtle, Boss, Jadwin, Howes Mill, Darien, Akers, Stone Hill and Gladden. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
